Text: Anyone know if there's a way to combine these files into something watchable on a Mac? Or is there any way the hi-res version could just be uploaded as 1 .avi file for future episodes? Thanks!

I'm not a MAC user but I use WinRAR on PC - you could try this link for the mac version
http://www.techspot.com/downloads/5169-winrar-for-mac.html
Hope it works for you!

Thanks for the up!

sharpsponge -- Download a program called The Unarchiver, unzip these files with it, and watch the video file with VLC. This is how I do it on my Mac.

http://unrarx.sourceforge.net/ 
Best Unrar tool for Mac that I have found.
